ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( AND( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Start__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(End__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Hours__c)) ), AND( OR( ISBLANK(Start__c), ISBLANK(End__c)), ISBLANK(Hours__c) ) ), NOT($Permission.Override_Venue_Validation) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Populate either Hours or Start and End.
